name: KiwiHacks 2026
description: Auckland's free 24hr hackathon for high schoolers. Build something cool, learn new skills, and meet like-minded coders. Food, drinks, and swag provided.

name: Campfire Auckland
description: A free 12hr game jam for high schoolers. Build a cool game, learn new skills, and meet like-minded coders. Food, drinks, and swag provided.

name: St Heliers Library Hack Club
description: A free weekly workshop for anyone under 18. Learn new skills, build cool projects, and meet like-minded coders.
